title: Key Fact Sheet for HBL CarLoan
file_name: Part 1 of Key Fact Sheet (HBL CarLoan)- July 2019.pdf
author: HBL
summary: The Key Fact Sheet for HBL CarLoan outlines the essential features, processing charges, and terms associated with the car loan product. Customers can finance up to 85% of the car's price with a repayment period of up to 7 years (5 years for used cars). The document includes detailed descriptions of various charges, including application processing fees, late payment charges, early settlement charges, and repossession fees. For further clarification, customers are encouraged to contact HBL Branches or HBL PhoneBanking at 111-111-425. The effective date for the terms is from July 1, 2019, to December 31, 2019.
